org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowContextImpl, ShadowContextWrapper

    Calls through to the resourceLoader to actually load resources.
